data.title: Glenn Greenwald's partner detained at Heathrow airport for nine hours, under controversial Terrorism Act 2000. He was denied access to a lawyer, and had his possessions confiscated.
TIME journalist says 'I can't wait to write a defense of the drone strike that takes out Julian Assange.' Here's the deleted tweet. Wikileaks have responded by demanding his resignation.
Off-duty Chinese policeman throws a baby to the ground for a bet (cracking her skull)...and gets 15 days disciplinary confinement. Nothing more.
Greenwald: The detention of my partner, David Miranda, by UK authorities will have the opposite effect of the one intended
Ecuador Asked the World to Pay it Not to Drill for Oil. The World Said No. So oil exploration is to begin in Yasuní National Park in the Amazon Rain Forest.
Australia to cut tax benefit for parents who don't immunise children
Writer and journalist Will Self was stopped by police while out walking with his son because they suspected he was a paedophile, he has said.
Snowden Reporter Glenn Greenwald: "Detaining my partner: a failed attempt at intimidation"
Cirque du Soleil shocks Beijing audience with Tiananmen 'tank man' pic
